Key Match Events: Toronto Raptors lost by 30 points to the Cleveland Cavaliers
Montreal’s Chris Boucher led the team in scoring with 18 points
The final score of the game was 136-106, with the Cavaliers coming out on top with a 25-point performance from Evan Mobley
Miscellaneous Highlights: The defeat exceeded the Raptors’ previous worst season-opener result, a 29 point loss to the Orlando Magic in 2001
Others: The Raptors will face the Philadelphia 76ers on Friday
